questions.text: Who is the new nurse in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Shelia Anderson.

	Hawkeye asked her out while they were in the O.R. and he said something like, it would be his luck that she had no teeth under that mask.

questions.text: While in the post-op, Hawkeye is feeding someone.  Who is it?
questions.explanation:
Trapper.

	He is feeding him what looks like oatmeal.  Not sure on that, don't quote me or anything.  He also said that Trapper had a case of the 24-hour flu that has been going on for three days.

questions.text: Who has to close up a wound on a patient that Frank was operating on when he fainted and got sick?
questions.explanation:
Margaret.

	Hawkeye told her to go and close, and that he would be over when she was done to check her work.  When he did, he said that she did a better job than Frank did.  She just rolled her eyes. Hehehe

questions.text: Margaret goes to the Swamp to get something that Frank has asked for.  What is it that he told her to get?
questions.explanation:
Bible.

	While she was in there she wanted to make it very clear to Hawkeye who it was that was going to be in charge while everyone was sick.

questions.text: Another batch of wounded came in while they were so short staffed.  In the O.R. even the nurses were doing some of the surgery.  Who was sent by Hawkeye to help the new nurse operate on her patient?
questions.explanation:
the Father.

	Yes he has had to help many times.  Although he does not know the names of anything, he is always willing to lend a helping hand.

questions.text: To whom does Hawkeye give an anti-flu shot?
questions.explanation:
Margaret.

	He said that he is not any good at giving them, just getting them.  He did make her yell a little.

questions.text: The person that Hawkeye just gave the shot, said that it was his turn.  Hawkeye told that person where he wanted his shot.  Where did he want it?
questions.explanation:
rear end.

	To be exact, he said and I quote, "I want mine in my tushy.  You know the soft fleshy part".  That line is a classic!

questions.text: Who walked in while Hawkeye was getting his shot?
questions.explanation:
Radar.

	He very quickly got out of there.  Hawkeye thought it was so funny, then Margaret stuck him and stuck him hard!  Then, things were not so funny.

questions.text: In this show, who was the last person to get sick?
questions.explanation:
Hawkeye.

	He told Margaret earlier in the show that he was sick, but that he had to go on because there was no one else to do it for him.

questions.text: At the end, who is it that came in the post-op to check up on, and to take the temp of the last person to get sick?
questions.explanation:
Radar.

	He came in while Henry, Frank, Margaret, and Trapper were all there.  He had on a lab coat.  He took charge.  It was cute.  This was right after the others had given him a get well card of sorts written on toilet paper.  Better known as the M*A*S*H stationary.
